text: ITV Granada was a television production company. It owned an ITV television channel of the same name. It produced a number of shows for many television stations (like Channel 4 and Sky). The company is now known as ITV Studios, which is owned by ITV plc. Granada's best known programme is the long-running soap opera Coronation Street. Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom Category:British entertainment companies
title: ITV Granada
